1370: Erkenradis moved to Kerckstraet.A.5 after marriage.
Got married to Eremboldus at age 25 in 1370.
Gave birth to Hetselo in 1370 at age 25.
1372: Gave birth to Bodekine in 1372 at age 27.
1373: Gave birth to Sarre in 1373 at age 28.
1375: Gave birth to Rissewint in 1375 at age 30.
1376: Gave birth to Tielen in 1376 at age 31.
1377: Gave birth to Sophia in 1377 at age 32.
1379: Gave birth to Eylwardo in 1379 at age 34.
Lost son Eylwardo when Eylwardo was 1 years old.
1380: Gave birth to Didderic in 1380 at age 35.
Lost son Didderic when Didderic was 1 years old.
1381: Lost daughter Sophia when Sophia was 5 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1382: Gave birth to Truden in 1382 at age 37.
